articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up a defamation case that the adult movie actress known as Stormy Daniels filed against former President Donald Trump, leaving in place lower court rulings that went against her.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue and Devan Cole, CNN
articles.title: Supreme Court denies election appeal from Pennsylvania Republicans
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday denied an appeal from Republicans challenging a Pennsylvania Supreme Court decision that allowed ballots received up to three days after Election Day to be counted to accommodate challenges by the coronavirus pandemic.
